title: Flex queue, some questions
body: guys i have a question for y'all. So at the moment i'm S3 in flex queue and my question is, do you get the golden border in you're loading screen next season when you're gold in flex too or only when you're gold in solo/duo queue?And the victorious skins, are those only for the ones who are gold in solo queue or also for those who are only gold in flex?

replies.body: We don't have any news yet on season rewards and how borders will work just yet.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for now as we get further updates!
